Interface GameElementCheckers

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameElementBuilder

    public interface GameElementCheckers
    This GameElementCheckers interface provides a definition of the methods that are used to check the values read from the input file. This interface is implemented by GameElementBuilder
    Author:
    dgoncalves

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Adventurer checkAndBuildAdventurer(java.lang.String aLine, int atLine, java.lang.String[] aSplitLine, int mapWidth, int mapHeight)
      Verifies the value provided for the definition of an Adventurer.
      Mountain checkAndBuildMountain(java.lang.String aLine, int atLine, java.lang.String[] aSplitLine, int mapWidth, int mapHeight)
      Verifies the value provided for the definition of a Mountain.
      Treasure checkAndBuildTreasure(java.lang.String aLine, int atLine, java.lang.String[] aSplitLine, int mapWidth, int mapHeight)
      Verifies the value provided for the definition of a Treasure.

    • Method Detail

      • checkAndBuildMountain

        Mountain checkAndBuildMountain(java.lang.String aLine,
                               int atLine,
                               java.lang.String[] aSplitLine,
                               int mapWidth,
                               int mapHeight)
                        throws ReadFileException
        Verifies the value provided for the definition of a Mountain.
        Parameters:
        aLine - the current line read from the input file for printing error messages purposes
        atLine - the number of the current line read from the input file for printing error messages purposes
        aSplitLine - a split array line with "-" delimiter read from the file
        Returns:
        a Mountain element if definition is valid
        Throws:
        a - ReadFileException if definition is not valid
        ReadFileException
